xml.spreadsheet

Class Style

  • java.lang.Object
    • xml.spreadsheet.Style

  • public class Style
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the information for a style definition in an XML spreadsheet. It can only be built attached to a certain XMLSpreadsheetGenerator by calling createStyle
    See Also:
    MSDN Style element reference, XMLSpreadsheetGenerator.createStyle()
